name: Dead Shift
description:
THERE ARE NO ZOMBIES IN THIS GAME

At first, I didn't believe what I heard... 
what I smelled... 
what I saw... 
again.  
I believed  Uncle Morty when he told me it couldn't happen...  again.
It wasn't supposed to happen...  again.    
It was never to happen...  again.
This can't be happening... again.

^^^ In prototype screen shot including some not zombies in the distance ^^^

In this long awaited sequel to a game that hasn't been created yet, you play as Uncle Morty's young protege in Dead Shift.

The dead reanimate and start their bid to leave their resting place.  You and Uncle Morty are the only ones working the graveyard that evening.   The job is supposed to be simple, put the dead in the dirt.  Tonight though, you have to kill them again.

Make sure they don't get out of the graveyard "alive"!

I REPEAT, THERE ARE NO ZOMBIES IN THIS GAME!

*** Controls ***

WASD to move
Mouse to look
Mouse Left to shoot
Mouse Right to zoom
G for grenade :)

Have Fun and don't forget to leave us a comment with what you would like to see in game!
